Pomodoro.name: Pomodoro
Pomodoro.author: Jiho Hwang <jito.hello@gmail.com>
Pomodoro.description: A Pomodoro timer Spoon that integrates with macOS Focus modes. Automatically starts when Focus mode changes to "Pomodoro" and provides a 25-minute work session followed by a 5-minute break.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts the Pomodoro Spoon and initializes all watchers and timers

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Stops the Pomodoro Spoon and cleans up resources

parameters.name: mapping
parameters.description:
A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
* start - Start a Pomodoro session
* stop - Stop the current session

returns.description:
A table with keys:
* today - Number of sessions completed today
* all - Table of daily statistics

constants.name: WORK_DURATION
constants.description: Work session duration in seconds (25 minutes)

constants.name: POMODORO_FOCUS_MODE
constants.description: Focus mode name that triggers Pomodoro sessions

notes: The Spoon automatically integrates with macOS Focus modes
When the 'Pomodoro' Focus mode is activated, a 25-minute work session starts
After the work session completes, a 5-minute break automatically begins
Statistics are stored in hs.settings with the key 'pomodoro.stats'
The menubar displays a tomato emoji (üçÖ) during work and coffee emoji (‚òï) during breaks

usage_examples.title: Basic usage
usage_examples.description: Load and start the Pomodoro Spoon

usage_examples.title: Get statistics
usage_examples.code:
local stats = spoon.Pomodoro:getStatistics()
print("Today's sessions:", stats.today)
print("All stats:", hs.inspect(stats.all))
